About

I am a front end web developer currently located in San Francisco, California. I've worked for various companies in the Bay Area: Thomson Reuters CS (formerly E.mochila), Mindjet, Ooma, and currently at Viator.

You can also find me at local dog parks or hiking trails with my german shepherd mix dog, Hutch.
